item.title: The horrible azure devops ui
item.description: Disclaimer: I read the docs, I know this is just complaining and not giving feedback, but man, this UI stills is horrible. So… Let’s put into situation, there was a connection update between devops and bitbucket and suddenly most of our pipelines stopped working. They told me to change the connection in the yaml file and that didn’t work. I know that there are three parts involving in a pipeline for sure:
